channel.title: Errors, AGAIN!
channel.description:
Ok, im adding a command. My compiler is working fine, but when i add this code: [code]if (command.startsWith("test") { addItem((1052), (10)); }AddItem(item id, amount)
[/code]
Ok, thats done saved, and when i come to compiling i get this:
[b]Client.java:1: class, interface, or enum expected if <command.startswith<"test"> client.java:4: class, interface , or enum expected > ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue...[/b]
[b][i]Anyone help? Lol i need so much help today. My first day at coding :P[/i][/b]

item.title: Errors, AGAIN!
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

try command.equalsIgnoreCase

Sometimes i can put:

command.startsWith

I get an error, all the time, for simple things like that. So put what i said.

Read full topic

{
addItem((1052), (10));
}AddItem(item id, amount)

if <command.startswith<“test”>
client.java:4: class, interface , or enum expected

^
2 errors
Press any key to continue…[/b]
